card.name: Koda - Talkative Cub
card.text: Tell Everybody: During opponents’ turns, you can’t lose lore.

prop.Flavor: "l mean, I don’t want to brag or nothing, but I got some moves."

card.name: Prince Naveen - Ukulele Player
card.text: Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.) It’s Beautiful No?: When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

card.name: Rutt - Nothern Moose
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "Let’s find some nice twigs, eh? I could use a snack!"

card.name: Kenai - Big Brother
card.text: Brothers Forever: While this character is exerted, your characters named Koda can’t be challenged.

prop.Flavor: "You have to look after your little brother, no matter how big a pain he is." - Kenai

card.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Sugar Rush Champ

prop.Flavor: "Look, the code may say I’m a princess, but I know who I really am…."
"I’d love a snack, but I’m kinda tied up right now."

card.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Candy Mechanic
card.text: You Have to Pay to Play: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -1※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "I’ll take whatever’s good… as long as there’s sugar in it."

card.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Trusty Builder
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Golly, this place is going to take some real fixing!"

card.name: Gazelle - Pop Star
card.text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)

prop.Flavor: "Good evening, Lorcana! We are here tonight to celebrate the possibilities that open up when we unite."

card.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Niceland Steward
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Fix-It Felix, Jr..) Building Together: Your locations get +2⛨.

card.name: Kristoff - Reindeer Keeper
card.text: Song Of The Herd: For each song card in your discard, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

card.name: Mirabel Madrigal - Family Gatherer
card.text: Not Without My Family: You can’t play this character unless you have 5 or more characters in play.

card.name: Daisy Duck - Donald’s Date
card.text: Big Prize: Whenever this character quests, each opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If it’s a character card, they may put it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of their deck.

card.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr. - Delighted Sightseer
card.text: Oh, My Land!: When you play this character, if you have a location in play, draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "l don’t think I’ve ever seen anything as sweet as this."

card.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Sugar Rush Princess
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Vanellope Von Schweetz.) I Hereby Decree: Whenever you play another Princess character, all opposing characters get -1※ until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Alan-a-Dale - Rockin’ Rooster
card.text: Fan Favorite: Whenever you play a song, gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Thank you! Now here’s a little ditty for our floodborn friends that we call 'Martin and the Flood.'"

card.name: Wreck-It Ralph - Admiral Underpants
card.text: I’ve Got the Coolest Friend: When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand. If that card is a Princess character card, gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: If he must give a victory speech, he’ll keep it brief.

card.name: Maid Marian - Mistress of the Range
card.text: If The Lady Wants It: When you play this character, opposing character of your choice gets -5※ until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Sven - Reindeer Steed
card.text: Reindeer Games: When you play this character, you may ready chosen character. They can’t quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Compassionate Friend
card.text: A Little Remedy: Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Oh my! Is this part of the Illuminary? I have to go help them!"

card.name: Try Everything
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character and ready them. They can’t quest or challenge for the rest of this tum.

prop.Flavor: I want to try even though I could fail

card.name: Healing Touch
card.text: Remove up to 4 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "The heart is not so easily changed, but the head can be persuaded." - Grand Pabbie

card.name: Revive
card.text: Play a character card with cost 5 or less from your discard for free.

prop.Flavor: Not all that is lost is gone forever.

card.name: Blast From Your Past
card.text: (A character with cost 6 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Name a card. Return all character cards with that name from your discard to your hand.

card.name: Invited to the Ball
card.text: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put revealed character cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Healing Decanter
card.text: Renewing Essence: ↷ - Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

card.name: Queen’s Sensor Core
card.text: Symbol of Nobility: At the start of your turn, if you have a Princess or Queen character in play, gain 1 lore. Royal Search: ↷, 2⬡ - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Princess or Queen character card, you may put it into our hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

card.name: Amber Chromicon
card.text: Amber Light: ↷ - Remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters.

prop.Flavor: "Comfort the weak and weary." - Inscription

card.name: Rapunzel’s Tower - Secluded Prison
card.text: Safe and Sound: Characters get +3⛨ while here.

prop.Flavor: "It’s a scary world out there." - Mother Gothel

card.name: Pride Lands - Jungle Oasis
card.text: Our Humble Home: While you have 3 or more characters here, you may banish this location to play a character from your discard for free.

card.name: Maleficent - Fearsome Queen
card.text: Shift 6 (You may pay 6⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Maleficent.) Everyone Listen: When you play this character, for each of your characters named Maleficent, return an opposing character, item, or location of your choice with a cost of 3 or less to their player’s hand.

card.name: Merlin - Turtle
card.text: Let Me Think About It: When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

prop.Flavor: "Don’t rush me now, this is important."

card.name: Archimedes - Exasperated Owl
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

prop.Flavor: "Hmph. What does on owl have to do to get a little peace and quiet around here?"

card.name: Bruni - Fire Salamander
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Parting Gift: When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Oh me, oh my! Did a piece just fall off the Illuminary?! I’ve got to tell someone before it’s toolate, late, late!"

card.name: Madam Mim - Elephant
card.text: A Little Game: When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand. Sneaky Move: At the start of your turn, you may move up to 2 damage counters from this character to chosen opposing character.

prop.Flavor: "This is just a warm-up, folks! Wait ’til you see the big finale!"

card.name: Anna - Mystical Majesty
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Anna.) Exceptional Power: When you play this character, exert all opposing characters.

card.name: Archimedes - Electrified Owl
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Archimedes.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3※.)

card.name: Elsa - The Fifth Spirit
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Crystallize: When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character.

card.name: Genie - Main Attraction
card.text: Spectacular Entertainer: When this character is exerted, opposing characters can’t ready at the start of their turn.

prop.Flavor: "Pay close attention! It’s time for a little illusion!"
The great beast breached the surface of the Azurite Sea, and the cry went out, "Monstro! Monstro!"

card.name: Magica De Spell - Cruel Sorceress
card.text: Playing With Power: During opponents’ turns, if an effect would cause you to discard one or more cards from your hand, you don’t discard.

prop.Flavor: "Evidently my invitation was lost. How dreadful. Here, let me help with the decorations…"

card.name: Rafiki - Shaman Duelist
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.) Surprising Skill: When you play this character, he gains Challenger +4 this turn. (They get +4※ while challenging.)

card.name: Anna - Enthusiastic Disciple
card.text: Growing Powers: When you play this character, each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.

prop.Flavor: "Ok, I can move small objects without problems. I need something bigger… Where’s Kristoff’s sled?"

card.name: Camilo Madrigal - Family Copycat
card.text: IMITATE Whenever this character quests, you may gain lore equal to the ◆ of chosen other character of yours. Return that character to your hand.

card.name: Hypnotic Strength
card.text: Draw a card. Chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging.)

prop.Flavor: Suddenly, Basil felt a strong desire to find the broken crown.

card.name: Finders Keepers
card.text: Draw 3 cards.

prop.Flavor: "Three wishes, comin’ right up!" - Iago

card.name: We Know the Way
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Shuffle chosen card from your discard into your deck. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has the same name as the chosen card, you may play the revealed card for free. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Retrosphere
card.text: Extract of Amethyst: 2⬡, Banish this item - Return chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player’s hand.

card.name: Half Hexwell Crown
card.text: An Unexpected Find: , 2⬡ - Draw a card. A Perilous Power: , 2⬡, Discard a card - Exert chosen character.

prop.Flavor: The broken crown holds dark and mysterious powers.

card.name: Amethyst Chromicon
card.text: Amethyst Light: ↷ - Each player may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Seek not power for its own sake." - Inscription

card.name: Elsa’s Ice Palace - Place of Solitude
card.text: Eternal Winter: When you play this location, choose an exerted character. While this location is in play, that character can’t ready at the start of their turn.

card.name: The Library - A Gift for Belle
card.text: Lost in a Book: Whenever a character is banished while here, you may draw a card.

card.name: Robin Hood - Timely Contestant
card.text: Tag Me In!: For each 1 damage on opposing characters, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)

card.name: Shenzi - Scar’s Accomplice
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Easy Prey: While challenging a damaged character, this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "You’re in for a real treat, Rob. Tonight’s house special is my famous outlaw grub. Made from the finest whatever we could find!"

card.name: Ulf - Mime
card.text: Silent Performance: This character can’t ↷ to sing songs.

prop.Flavor: His performances are unspeakably good.

card.name: Ed - Laughing Hyena
card.text: Cause A Panic: When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.

prop.Flavor: "A-heh, heh, heh, heh, heh, hee, hee, heeeee."

card.name: Flora - Good Fairy
card.text: Fiddle Faddle: While being challenged, this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: "Don’t fuss, dear! A flick of the wrist will turn these briars into something beautiful."

card.name: Merryweather - Good Fairy
card.text: When you play this character, you may pay 1⬡ to give chosen character +2※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "The most beautiful color is blue!"

card.name: Robin Hood - Archery Competitor
card.text: Masterstroke: When you play this character, if an opponent has a damaged character in play, you gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "For a moment I thought this might be a real challenge."
"The secret to a good cake is combining everything just right. Every ingredient is important, but the magic is in how they work together."

card.name: Iago - Fake Flamingo
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) In Disguise: Whenever this character quests, you pay 2⬡ less for the next action you play this turn.

prop.Flavor: He’ll never turn down a quick bite before dinner.

card.name: Ed - Hysterical Partygoer
card.text: Rowdy Guest: Damaged characters can’t challenge this character.

prop.Flavor: As far as he’s concerned, there’s no such thing as bad taste.

card.name: Scroop - Odious Mutineer
card.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Do Say Hello to Mr. Arrow: When you play this character, you may pay 3 to banish chosen damaged character.

card.name: Prince Phillip - Swordsman of the Kingdom
card.text: Dragon Slayer: When you play this character, banish chosen opposing Dragon character. Take Advantage: Whenever this character challenges a damaged character, ready him after the challenge.

card.name: Clarabelle - Light Hooved
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Clarabelle.) Keep Pace: At the end of your turn, choose an opponent. If they have more cards in hand than you, you may draw until you have the same amount as them.

card.name: Anna - Diplomatic Queen
card.text: Royal Resolution: When you play this character, you may pay 2⬡ to choose one: • Each opponent chooses and discards a card. • Chosen character gets +2※ this turn. • Banish chosen damaged character.

card.name: Clarabelle - Clumsy Guest
card.text: Butterfingers: When you play this character, you may pay 2⬡ to banish chosen item.

card.name: Banzai - Taunting Hyena
card.text: Here Kitty, Kitty, Kitty: When you play this character, you may exert chosen damaged character.

card.name: Robin Hood - Sneaky Sleuth
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Robin Hood.) Clever Plan: This character gets +1◆ for each opposing damaged character in play.

card.name: Clarabelle - Contented Wallflower
card.text: One Step Behind: When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "Golly! Those dancers can really moo-ve!"

card.name: Shenzi - Head Hyena
card.text: Stick Around For Dinner: This character gets +1※ for each other Hyena character you have in play. What Have We Got Here?: Whenever one of your Hyena characters challenges a damaged character, gain 2 lore.

card.name: Scar - Vengeful Lion
card.text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) Life’s Not Fair, Is It?: Whenever one of your character challenges a damaged character, you may draw a card.

card.name: Hypnotic Deduction
card.text: Draw 3 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on the top of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "A security device! Easily defeated, of course. Once I make room for the crown, I…can…bring…it…to…him."

card.name: Night Howler Rage
card.text: Draw a card. Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can’t quest and must challenge if able.)

prop.Flavor: "I think someone is targeting predators on purpose and making them go savage!" - Judy Hopps

card.name: You’re Welcome
card.text: (A character with cost 4 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Shuffle chosen character, item, or location into their player’s deck. That player draws 2 cards.

prop.Flavor: I make everything happen!

card.name: Remember Who You Are
card.text: If chosen opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw cards until you have the same number.

card.name: Prince John’s Mirror
card.text: You Look Regal: If you have a character named Prince John in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play this item. A Feeling Of Power: At the end of each opponent’s turn, if they have more than 3 cards in their hand, they discard until they have 3 cards in their hand.

card.name: Obscurosphere
card.text: Extract of Emerald: 2⬡, Banish this item - Your characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can’t choose them except to challenge.)

card.name: Emerald Chromicon
card.text: Emerald Light: During opponents’ turns, whenever one of your characters is banished, you may return chosen character to their player’s hand.

prop.Flavor: "Trust in the winds of change." - Inscription

card.name: Sherwood Forest - Outlaw Hideaway
card.text: : Your characters named Robin Hood may move here for free. Familiar Terrain: Characters gain Ward and "↷, 1⬡ - Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character" while here. (Opponents can’t choose them except to challenge.)

card.name: Tropical Rainforest - Jaguar Lair
card.text: Snack Time: Opposing damaged characters gain Reckless. (They can’t quest and must challenge if able.)

prop.Flavor: "There’s not a glimmer that can keep up with me. You might as well quit now."

card.name: Wreck-It Ralph - Demolition Dude
card.text: Refreshing Break: Whenever you ready this character, gain 1 lore for each 1 damage on him.

card.name: Maximus - Team Champion
card.text: A Reward Fit for a King: At the end of your turn, if one of your characters has 5※ or more, gain 2 Lore. If they have 10※ or more, gain 5 Lore instead.

card.name: Turbo - Royal Hack
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.) Game Jump: This character also counts as being named King Candy for Shift.

card.name: Donald Duck - Pie Slinger
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) Humble Pie: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, each opponent loses 2 lore. Raging Duck: While an opponent has 10 or more lore, this character gets +6※.

prop.Flavor: Ingredients: Butter, sugar, unsweetened chocolate, vanilla, and arrogance.

card.name: Scar - Traitor
card.text: Long Live the King: When you play this character, you may banish a Mufasa character of your choice.

prop.Flavor: The second Rule of Villainy: Don’t settle for second place.

card.name: Showanna Rainbeau - Cool Competitor
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

prop.Flavor: When it comes to racing, she never gets cold feet.

card.name: Mickey Mouse - Enthusiastic Dancer
card.text: Perfect Partners: While you have a character named Minnie Mouse in play, this character gets +2※.

prop.Flavor: He loves to share the spotlight with a star like Minnie.

card.name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Crowd Favorite
card.text: Showstopper: When you play this character, if you have a location in play, each opponent loses 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Never lose sight of where you’re going. Second place."
"You’ll pay for what you’ve done! I’ll track you all the way to the Azurite Sea if I have to!"

card.name: Pete - Steamboat Rival
card.text: Get Out!: When you play this character, if you have at least one other Pete character in play, you may banish chosen opposing character.

card.name: Taffyta Muttonfudge - Sour Speedster
card.text: Shift 2 (You may pay 2⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Taffyta Muttonfudge.) New Roster: Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain 2 lore.

card.name: Gaston - Pure Paragon
card.text: A Man Among Men!: For each damaged character you have in play, you pay 2⬡ less to play this character. Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

card.name: Arthur - Novice Sparrow
card.text: Reckless (This character can’t quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

prop.Flavor: "Hold it, boy. Not so fast." - Merlin

card.name: Ratigan - Party Crasher
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named 4.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Delightfully Wicked: Your damaged characters get +2※.

card.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Random Roster Racer
card.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.) Pixlexia: When you play this character, she gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

card.name: Simba - Adventurous Successor
card.text: I Laugh in the Face of Danger: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2※ this turn.

card.name: Minnie Mouse - Dazzling Dancer
card.text: Dance-Off: Whenever this character or one of your characters named Mickey Mouse challenges another character, gain 1 lore.

prop.Flavor: She doesn’t seek the spotlight - the spotlight seeks her.

card.name: Break Free
card.text: Deal 1 damage to chosen character of yours. They gain Rush and get +1※ this turn. (They can challenge the turn they’re played.)

prop.Flavor: Tink darted from the shattered lantern in the blink of an eye.

card.name: The End is Near
card.text: Ready chosen character of yours. They can’t quest for the rest of this turn. If you chose a Villain character, gain 1 lore.

card.name: Don’t Let The Frostbite Bite
card.text: (A character with cost 7 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Ready all your characters. They can’t quest for the rest of this turn.

prop.Flavor: Let’s call it a night.

card.name: Glimmer vs Glimmer
card.text: Banish chosen character of yours to banish chosen character.

prop.Flavor: Hades: "Listen, kid. If I’m gettin’ banished back to the lorebook, you’re going with me." Hercules: "We’ll see about that."

card.name: Who’s With Me?
card.text: Your characters get +2※ this turn. Whenever one of your characters with Reckless challenges another character this turn, gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Don’t forget, the purple unicorn is mine!"

card.name: Potion of Force
card.text: Disgusting Concoction: 1⬡, exile this item - Chosen character gains +3※ this turn. If that character is a Villain, they gain +4※ instead.

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: The Sword Released
card.text: Power Appointed: At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more ※ than each opposing character in play, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost.

card.name: Ruby Chromicon
card.text: Ruby Light: ↷ - Chosen character gets +1※ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "Leave fear behind." - Inscription

card.name: Sugar Rush Speedway - Starting Line
card.text: On Your Marks!: Once per turn, you may ↷ chosen character here and deal them 1 damage to move them to another location for free.

card.name: Ratigans Party - Seedy Back Room
card.text: Misfits’ Revelry: While you have a damaged character here, this location gets +2◆.

prop.Flavor: "My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy."
"Look, look! My tooth is even looser today!"

card.name: Merlin - Back From Bermuda
card.text: Long Live The King!: Your Arthur characters get Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

prop.Flavor: "A little rest and relaxation will be good for your health, boy."

card.name: Pacha - Emperors Guide
card.text: Helpful Supplies: At the start of your turn, if you have an item in play, gain 1 lore. Perfect Directions: At the start of your turn, if you have a location in play, gain 1 lore.

card.name: The Queen - Fairest Of Them All
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.) Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) Reflections Of Vanity: For each other The Queen character you have in play, this character gets +1◆.

card.name: Sheriff Of Nottingham - Old Moneybags
card.text: Every Little Bit Helps: For each item you have in play, you pay 1⬡ less to play this character. Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.)

card.name: Chicha - Dedicated Mother
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.) One On The Way: During your turn, when you put a card into your inkwell, if it’s the second card you’ve put into your inkwell this turn, you may draw a card.

card.name: Prince John - Gold Lover
card.text: Beautiful, Lovely Taxes: ↷ - Play an item from your hand or discard with cost 5 or less for free, exerted.

prop.Flavor: A villainous schemer from day to night.

card.name: The Queen - Head of the Council
card.text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) Unite The Villains: When you play this character, look at at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal and put as many Queen characters as you want into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck, in any order.

card.name: Kuzco - Selfish Emperor
card.text: Outplacement: When you play this character, you may put chosen item or location into its player’s inkwell facedown and exerted. By Invite Only: 4⬡ - Your other characters gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

card.name: Mufasa - Ruler of Pride Rock
card.text: A Delicate Balance: When you play this character, exert all cards in your inkwell, then return 2 cards at random from your inkwell to your hand. Everything The Light Touches: Whenever this character quests, ready all cards in your inkwell.

card.name: Ludwig von Drake - Self Proclaimed Genius

prop.Flavor: "So you see, there’s a dark void at the edge of Lorcana. A complete absence of electromagnetic radiation! What’s it made of? I don’t know! The light’s just gone. Kaput!"

card.name: Basil - Practiced Detective
card.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.)

prop.Flavor: "This case is as good as solved" - Basil

card.name: King Candy - Sweet Abomination
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named King Candy.)

card.name: Tanana - Wise Woman
card.text: Your Brothers Need Guidance: When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character or location.

card.name: Tipo - Growing Son
card.text: Measure Me Again: When you play this character, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

card.name: Merlin - Intellectual Visionary
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Merlin.) Overdeveloped Brain: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may search for any card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Royal Tantrum
card.text: Banish any number of your items, then draw a card for each item banished this way.

prop.Flavor: "I am King! King! King!"

card.name: Ever Just The Same
card.text: (A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Remove up to 2 damage from any number of characters of your choice.

prop.Flavor: And ever just as sure As the sun will rise

card.name: I’m Not Having Fun Anymore
card.text: Choose one of your characters and place it in your inkwell facedown and exhausted.

prop.Flavor: "Pretty pathetic, huh?"

card.name: Medal of Heroes
card.text: Congratulations, Soldier: ↷, 2⬡, Banish this item - Chosen character of yours gets +2◆ this turn.

prop.Flavor: "You have etched in the rock of virtue a legacy beyond compare." - General Hologram

card.name: Basil’s Magnifying Glass
card.text: : ↷, 2⬡ - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

prop.Flavor: "“l say, a piece of the Hexwell Crown!" - Basil

card.name: Merlin’s Carpetbag
card.text: Hockety Pockety: ↷, 1⬡ - Return an item card from your discard to your hand.

prop.Flavor: "What a way to pack!" - Arthur

card.name: Sapphire Chromicon
card.text: Powering Up: This item enters play exerted. Sapphire Light: ↷, 2⬡, Banish one of your items - Gain 2 lore.

prop.Flavor: "Knowledge is eternal." - Inscription

card.name: The Great Illuminary - Radiant Ballroom
card.text: Warm Welcome: Characters with Support get +1◆ and +2⛨ while here.
card.prop: Location Location Sapphire Yes 3> 2 2/9 9 0 Carlos Ruiz Lorcana Every surface glows with the joy of celebration.

card.name: Merlin’s Cottage - The Wizard’s Home
card.text: Knowledge Is Power: Each player plays with the top card of their deck face up.

card.name: Stitch - Team Underdog
card.text: Heave Ho!: When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: He’s not the biggest glimmer on the team, but he still packs a wallop.

card.name: Jafar - Tyrannical Hypnotist
card.text: Challenger +7 (While challenging, this character gets +7※.) Intimidating Gaze: Opposing characters with cost 4 or less can’t challenge.

prop.Flavor: "No one will keep me from the broken crown!"

card.name: Simba - Lost Prince
card.text: Face The Past: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your may draw a card.

prop.Flavor: "This is my kingdom. If I don’t fight for it, who will?"
"The Illuminary can’t handle this much groove! We have to keep the noise down or it’ll fall apart for sure!"
"Hey, I’ve been turned into a cow. Can I go home?"

card.name: Sleepy - Sluggish Knight
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: Heihei - Protective Rooster
card.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

card.name: Sneezy - Noisy Knight
card.text: Headwind: When you play this character, chosen Knight character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging.)

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: Dopey - Knight Apprentice
card.text: Stronger Together: When you play this character, if you have another Knight character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

prop.type: I Have No Other Choice: For each opposing character that was banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2⬡ less to play this character. Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

card.name: Snow White - Fair-Hearted
card.text: Natural Leader: This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight)

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
prop.Flavor: Friendship is the best armor of all.

card.name: Kronk - Head of Security
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Kronk.) Are You on the List?: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

card.name: Grumpy - Sceptical Knight
card.text: Boon Of Resilience: While one of your Knight characters is at a location, that character gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.) Burst Of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: Pete - Wrestling Champ
card.text: Re-Pete: ↷ - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a character card named Pete, you may play it for free.

prop.Flavor: He’ll have you seeing double.

card.name: Sir Ector - Lord of the Castle

prop.Flavor: "Well, my goodness, don’t stay here. Let’s drink to the health of my son Kay… And hope we get rid of that awful magician, Marvin or whatever."

card.name: Bashful - Adoring Knight
card.text: Impress The Princess: While you have a character named Snow White in play, this character gains Bodyguard. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: Happy - Lively Knight
card.text: Burst of Speed: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: Simba - Son of Mufasa
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.) Impressive Roar: When you play this character, you may banish chosen object or location.

card.name: Doc - Bold Knight
card.text: Drastic Measures: When you play this character, you may discard your hand to draw 2 cards.

prop.Franchise: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

card.name: Arthur - King Victorious
card.text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Arthur.) Knighted by the King: When you play this character, chosen characters gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 and can challenge ready characters this turn. (They get +2※ while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

card.name: Pete - Game Referee
card.text: Whistle: When you play this character, opponents can’t play actions until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Tug-of-War
card.text: Choose one: • Deal 1 damage to each opposing character without Evasive. • Deal 3 damage to each opposing character with Evasive.

card.name: When Will My Life Begin?
card.text: (A character with cost 3 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.) Chosen character can’t challenge during their next turn. Draw a card.

prop.Flavor: Stuck in the same place I’ve always been…

card.name: Plate Armor
card.text: Well Crafted: ↷ - Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

card.name: Steel Chromicon
card.text: Steel Light: ↷ - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

prop.Flavor: "Strong in will, strong in battle." - Inscription

card.name: Bad-Anon - Villain Support Center
card.text: There’s No One I’d Rather Be Than Me: Villain characters gain "↷, 3⬡ - Play a character with the same name as this character for free" while here.

card.name: Archimedes - Electrified Owl (Enchanted)
card.text: Shift 3 (You may pay 3⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Archimedes.) Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3※.)

card.name: Donald Duck - Pie Slinger (Enchanted)
card.text: Shift 4 (You may pay 4⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Donald Duck.) Humble Pie: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, each opponent loses 2 lore. Raging Duck: While an opponent has 10 or more lore, this character gets +6※.

card.name: Royal Tantrum (Enchanted)
card.text: Banish any number of your items, then draw a card for each item banished this way.
